discourse_list.title: What's with the spam in the Code of Conduct topic?

content.content: All messages past the first one look like spam. Some are blatantly obvious, e.g. this one:     Forum Guidelines and Code of Conduct 🤖 DAO Governance and Vision       I will love to work with the team, I’m a Graphics Designer, Brand identifier, Creative visual … WhatsApp number +2347069522581     I’m new to the forum so I don’t have the trust level to flag those posts yet, and there are way too many. Hopefully a mod will mass delete them.
